title: [GAMEPLAY] Urgot R vs Skaarl
body: If Urgot suppresses a dismounted Kled, and Kled's passive procs during the suppression and he remounts Skaarl before he is executed, only Skaarl's health bar will be removed and Kled dismounts again safe and sound. It's highly frustrating when Urgot's ultimate doesn't execute someone like you expect it to do.

replies.body: Sadly not a bug. That's how Skaarl works.
